title: Domain-Driven Design (DDD)
subtext: Align software design with business needs
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Domain-Driven Design (DDD)
texts: DDD is a software design approach focused on modeling software closely to the business domain. It emphasizes understanding and aligning the software with business needs.
Key concepts include entities, value objects, and aggregates, ensuring that software reflects real-world business structures.
